name: withDateUtc
signature: { <A>(f: (date: Date) => A): (self: DateTime) => A; <A>(self: DateTime, f: (date: Date) => A): A; }
description:
Using the time zone adjusted `Date`, apply a function to the `Date` and
return the result.
documentation:
Using the time zone adjusted `Date`, apply a function to the `Date` and
return the result.
